verses.name: Romans 13:10
verses.text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour: therefore love is the fulfilling of the law.

verses.name: Romans 13:11
verses.text: And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed.

verses.name: Romans 13:12
verses.text: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.

verses.name: Romans 13:13
verses.text: Let us walk honestly, as in the day; not in rioting and drunkenness, not in chambering and wantonness, not in strife and envying.
